decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (As Amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing/plan titles: HC-R00-EX-101; HC-R01-PR-101 Rev. 1; HC-R01-PR-102 Rev. 1; HC-R01-PR-103 Rev. 1; HC-R01-PR-104 Rev. 1; and HC-R01-PR-105 Rev. 1.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match or complement the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with Section 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), as well as, policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013). | No part of any roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
description: Part single-storey, part two-storey rear/side wraparound extension; alterations to roof involving a hip-to-gable enlargement to side and roof extension to rear of main roofslopes; single-storey front extension to form a porch; and installation of three rooflights to front roof slope.
